headline: IntelliTrans Adds Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing to Executive Team
summary: Brings a Wealth of Experience in Building High-Performance Sales and Marketing Teams Matt Everson headshot Matt Everson joins IntelliTrans as Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing ATLANTA, Nov. 19, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- IntelliTrans, a leading global multimodal transportation management solutions provider, is proud to announce the addition of Matt Everson as Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing. headline: DAT: Spot truckload rates extended their positive run in October
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., November 19, 2024--Truckload freight volumes continued to build in October as shippers looked for capacity to get ahead of the holiday retail season and potentially higher tariffs next year, said DAT Freight & Analytics, which operates the DAT One freight marketplace and DAT iQ data analytics service.
